thread.title: Re: We have a WINNER! Guess who Robert Reich suspects is behind the Berkeley riot
thread.title_full: Re: We have a WINNER! Guess who Robert Reich suspects is behind the Berkeley riot

author: Nos Nevets
title: Re: We have a WINNER! Guess who Robert Reich suspects is behind the Berkeley riot
text:
We have a WINNER! Guess who Robert Reich suspects is behind the Berkeley riot Posted at 9:43 am on February 3, 2017 by Doug P. 
For progressives like Robert Reich (with the willing assistance from many in the media), there will be no level of violence in the coming days and months for which the Left will be to blame: VIDEO – CNN’s Lemon and Robert Reich: Conservatives Masterminded the Berkeley Riots https://t.co/p6eQMQmsEO 
— Grabien (@GrabienMedia) February 3, 2017 
Partial transcript (video at the link): 
LEMON: “You think it’s a strategy by Yiannopoulos or right-wingers? They put this on in an effort to show there’s no free speech on a college campus like UC Berkeley?” 
REICH: “I wouldn’t bet against it, Don. Again, I saw these people. They all looked almost paramilitary. They were not from the campus. And I’ve heard — again, I don’t want to say factually, but I’ve heard there was some relationship here between these people and the right wing and the right-wing movement that is affiliated with Breitbart News.” 
LEMON: “It is interesting because there have been protests but nothing this violent. We haven’t seen anything to this level.” 
Well, that’s a theory certainly not unexpected from Reich. Me, when CNN says the #Berkeley rioters were 'right wing' pic.twitter.com/xSdre6rHmD 
— Jason C. (@CounterMoonbat) February 3, 2017 @GrabienMedia This is exactly why @CNN is #FakeNews . and @donlemon is one of the worst perpetrators of it. #BanCNN 
— Les K. (@Wolfiemann) February 3, 2017 Right, they were bussed in from Texas on the Koch brother's dime. lol dopes https://t.co/pCbzhsZuRI 
— Ryan T (@fishfinder45) February 3, 2017 Watch soon for the burst of gamma rays as Hivemind Media’s credibility falls thru the event horizon & into a black hole. #tcot https://t.co/6LTzSwS06f
